name: Sati - Re:minding
description: This contract presents a unique way to memorialise conversations with a carefully crafted LLM we call Sati, which is the Pali term for 'remember', or 'mindfulness'. Each NFT memorialises the whole conversation between human and AI as we search for lasting, practical wisdom in the space between one another. The image is also generated from the conversation itself, adding another - visual - layer of meaning to this multifaceted interaction.
